name: src/generics.js

params.name: param.lon
params.description: alias for longitude (will be used when not given .lng)

name: BaseRouter
description: Base class element for building custom router elements (e.g. {@link HereTransitRouter}).

name: _elapsedTime
description: Calculates current elapsed time in seconds

params.name: geometry
params.description: the geometry points excluding start, dest

name: extendLeg
description: Extends this Leg with the `other` Leg

params.name: other
params.description: The other Leg to be added.

name: findRootElement
description:
Find a DOMElement. It has various ways:
- try finding {@link DOMNode} by {@link DOMSelector} including a class check
- iterate over parent-nodes to find a {@link DOMNode} of the specified class
- find a {@link DOMNode} by querying by tag-name. Fails if not exactly one node found.
- return default if specified or throw error.

params.name: selector
params.description: The dom selector to find the element.

params.name: defaultValue
params.description: Returned value if not found. NEED TO BE DIFFERENT THAN `undefined`!!

return.description: The node or undefined if not found.

throws.description: Exception when no {DOMNode} was found and no defaultValue was provided.

name: buildURI
description: Builds a URI from a base-url and params. Empty values gets filteres.

params.name: params
params.description: Parameters to be encoded in the url.

name: deferredPromise
description: Create a Promise that can be resolved later.

name: src/google/index.js
src/google/map.js
GoogleMap
description:
Shows a Google map. This is the base canvas for other visualisation elements.
It requires a {@link GooglePlatform} component to handle credentials.

name: src/google/platform.js
GooglePlatform
description: The platform element is required to handle credentials for GOOGLE services.

name: src/google/router.js

types: {"WALKING": string, "COMMUTER_TRAIN": string, "SUBWAY": string, "HEAVY_RAIL": string, "HIGH_SPEED_TRAIN": string, "LONG_DISTANCE_TRAIN": string, "BUS": string}

name: GoogleDirectionsRouter
description: Provides an router element for google directions. It can be referenced in map components.

name: src/here/index.js
src/here/map-route-picker.js
HereMapRoutePicker
description: Adds start+stop map-marker to map and bind them to the router. When markers dragged the router gets updated.
examples:
<here-platform app-id="..." app-code="..."></here-platform>
<router id="router"></router>

<here-map platform="here-platform" center="13.5,52.5" zoom="11">
  <here-map-route-picker router="#router"></here-map-route-picker>
</here-map>

name: src/here/map-routes.js
src/here/map.js
HereMap
description:
Shows HERE map. This is the base canvas for other visualisation elements.
It requires a {@link HerePlatform} component to handle credentials.

name: src/here/platform.js
HerePlatform
description:
The platform element is required to handle credentials for HERE services.

Attributes:
- app_id - credentials
- app_code - credentials

name: src/here/router.js
HereRouter
description: Provides an router element for generic HERE routing. It can be referenced in map components.

name: src/here/transit-router.js

types: {"0": string, "3": string, "4": string, "5": string, "7": string, "8": string, "12": string, "20": string}

name: HereTransitRouter
description:
Router element to perform transit routing. Results can be displayed at a Map (e.g. {@link HereMap})

Requires `platform` or `_app_id_`+`app_code` attributes.
examples:
<here-transit-router
    platform="..."                 # requires platform
    app-id="..." app_code="..."    #     -or- app-id + appcode
    start="lat,lng"
    dest="lat,lng"
    time="2019-01-12T14:30:00">
</here-transit-router>

description: Create a Promise that can be resolved later.

RouteDebug
description: Displays an ugly but copyable string about the current route.

name: src/route-link.js
src/route-selector.js
elementTemplate
description: Extracts a template content from {DOMNode} specified via {DOMSelector}

name: RouteSelector
description: Selector watches a router and emits style events according to user input (mouse)

params.name: exclusive
params.description: if true other selected routes will be unselected

name: src/union-router.js
UnionRouter
description: Element for combining multiple routers {BaseRouter}s into one.
examples:
<router1 id="router1"></router1>
<router2 id="router2"></router2>

<union-router routers="#router1,#router2"
    start="lat,lon"
    dest="lat,lon"
    time="now">
</union-router>

params.name: routers
params.description: A list of routers or a comma-separated {@link DOMSelector} string.

content:
MAPS Web Components =================== This is a prototype to use maps out there in an easy and declarative way. Examples are located in _examples/_ folder. Concepts -------- - normalized `Maps`, `Router`, `Search` from different providers (Google, HERE, MapBox). - declarative compositing of scenarios. Support: -------- - Google: routing - HERE: Map, Transit routing, Route picking, Route rendering - MapBox: Map, Route picking, Route rendering Example ======= A fully functional map with transit route and drag'n'drop markers to change the route.
Usage ===== Build the build: _not yet implemented_ (What is a good packaging? Webpack?) Build docs: make docs Clean workspace: make clean
name: ./README.md

content:
{
    "name": "@proddi/map-components",
    "version": "0.0.1",
    "license": "MIT",
    "module": "src/index.js",
    "main": "build/dist/map-components.js",
    "repository": {
        "type": "git",
        "url": "https://github.com/proddi/map-components.git"
    },
    "scripts": {
        "build": "./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.js",
        "build:prod": "NODE_ENV=production npm run build",
        "build:docs": "rm -rf build/docs; ./node_modules/.bin/esdoc -c docs/conf.json",
        "push:docs": "./node_modules/.bin/gh-pages -d build/docs/ -m \"Auto-generated commit for documentation\""
    },
    "dependencies": {
        "@polymer/app-layout": "^3.0.2",
        "@polymer/font-roboto-local": "^3.0.2",
        "@polymer/iron-demo-helpers": "^3.0.2",
        "@polymer/iron-icons": "^3.0.1",
        "@polymer/iron-pages": "^3.0.1",
        "@polymer/paper-card": "^3.0.1",
        "@polymer/paper-icon-button": "^3.0.1",
        "@polymer/paper-item": "^3.0.1",
        "@polymer/paper-progress": "^3.0.1",
        "@polymer/paper-tabs": "^3.0.1",
        "esdoc-external-events-plugin": "^1.0.0",
        "lit-html": "^0.14.0"
    },
    "devDependencies": {
        "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
        "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
        "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
        "gh-pages": "^2.0.1",
        "polymer-cli": "^1.9.4",
        "webpack": "^4.28.3",
        "webpack-cli": "^3.2.0"
    }
}
